title: Similar in a Way….?
detail_text: <:th_ch0207/>Ah! Look! Umi-san! That’s the novel we’ve been looking for!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Wa-...., Setsuna! Please don’t just run off like that!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Ah….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Also, you should keep your voice down as much as you can in a bookstore<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>O-, okay. Sorry….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>As long as you understand<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>When I see something I love, I usually lose sight of my surroundings…. And that often causes me trouble. Now I’ve caused trouble for you, Umi-san. I’m truly sorry….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Listen, Setsuna<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Yes….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>First of all, I don’t feel inconvenienced by it. Besides, I have a childhood friend that is very much like you, so I’m used to dealing with it. So, you don’t have to worry about anything<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>U-, Umi-san….! Thank you….!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
